MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL12 postcode area of Llay, affecting properties in Bryn Place and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 06.55am. Our engineers have arrivedon site and are investigating the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 10.00am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 07.25am on 27th April 2021.
